meanings.definition: A store that sells fresh fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: I bought some apples and carrots at the greengrocery.
meanings.sent2: My mom always shops at the greengrocery for our weekly produce.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tomato go to the greengrocery? To find its salad friends!
meanings.sent4: The greengrocery is a colorful oasis in the concrete jungle.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh greens at the greengrocery is irresistible.

meanings.definition: The business of selling fresh fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: She decided to start her own greengrocery to support local farmers.
meanings.sent2: The greengrocery industry is booming due to increased demand for healthy food.
meanings.sent3: Why did the banana join the greengrocery business? It wanted to find its peel-mate!
meanings.sent4: In the world of greengrocery, every carrot is a star.
meanings.sent5: The greengrocery business requires a lot of hard work and dedication.

meanings.definition: The products sold at a greengrocery store.
meanings.sent1: The greengrocery had a wide variety of fresh fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: Customers were impressed by the quality of the produce at the greengrocery.
meanings.sent3: Why did the potato blush at the greengrocery? It saw the sweet potatoes!
meanings.sent4: The greengrocery offerings were a feast for the eyes.
meanings.sent5: Each item at the greengrocery looked plump and delicious.
